name: Lets Get This Bread
description: $LGTB (Let’s Get This Bread) is a new memecoin on the Solana Blockchain that launched on Meteora’s M3M3 staking protocol. Based on the classic meme "Lets Get This Bread", it is designed for hustlers and go-getters, embodying the relentless optimism of securing wins and stacking rewards. The token allows holders to stake $LGTB on Meteora's M3M3 platform to earn more tokens and SOL rewards that accrue through trading fees.
